tools.name: analyze_image
tools.description: Analyze an image and extract insights. Use this for charts, screenshots, diagrams, photos, or any visual content.

image_path.description: Path to the image file to analyze

query.description: Specific question or aspect to focus on in the image (optional)

detail_level.description: Level of detail for analysis (default: high)

tools.name: extract_chart_data
tools.description: Extract numerical data from charts, graphs, or plots. Use this when you need to get the actual data values from a visualization.

chart_type.description: Type of chart (auto-detect if not specified)

tools.name: compare_images
tools.description: Compare multiple images and identify similarities or differences. Use this for before/after comparisons or visual analysis.

image_paths.description: List of image paths to compare (2-5 images)

tools.name: ocr_extract_text
tools.description: Extract text from images using OCR. Use this for screenshots, scanned documents, or images with text.

image_path.description: Path to the image containing text
